author: Tanveer Mann
title: Couple shamed on national TV for having sex on their balcony
text:
The couple were filmed making love in the city of Salamanca in Spain. (Picture: CEN) A couple who were filmed having sex on their balcony were publicly shamed after their romp was broadcast on national TV. 
Woman, 38, ‘had sex with boy, 14, after sending him nude pictures’ A passerby filmed the couple after spotting them in the city of Salamanca in the central Spanish region of Castile and Leon.
It was then picked up by Spanish TV channel, Telecinco and Antena 3, which broadcast the loved-up couple making love on a high balcony overlooking Avenue Portugal.

Footage shows the couple completely unaware that they are being filmed.
Fortunately, a little bit of their modesty remained in tact thanks to a railing which partially covered them.
Neighbours were reportedly shocked at the pair having sex in broad daylight in full view of children on the street below.

Neighbours were shocked at seeing the couple having sex in broad daylight (Picture: CEN) But people online were a little bit more care-free about the whole thing, saying the couple had every right to enjoy the spring sunshine.
One person wrote: ‘Everyone can do whatever they want in their house’ while another said: ‘This is because spring has sprung.’
